TIL: Ballcock valves
I need to repair one of my toilets. It makes this weird noise after every flush. After a quick Google search, today I learned that the most likely culprit is a faulty ballcock valve.Ballcock. ðŸ˜… I am still giggling. I'm a child.It doesn't help that the toilet is a Mansfield.#TIL #Ballcock #DIY

content.html:
TIL: Ballcock valves

I need to repair one of my toilets. It makes this weird noise after every flush. After a quick Google search, today I learned that the most likely culprit is a faulty ballcock valve.

Ballcock. ðŸ˜…

I am still giggling. I'm a child.

It doesn't help that the toilet is a Mansfield.

#TIL #Ballcock #DIY
